caption: Laughter, jokes, and a whole lot of fun! Aaditya Kulshreshth brought the house down with his hilarious comedy set at Techniche. His wit and humor left everyone in stitches.

This week’s entries had us mesmerized by the magic of patterns! From the hypnotic repetition of natural formations to the meticulously crafted designs by human hands, your photos showcased the captivating world of patterns all around us. A huge shoutout to,,,,, and for their stunning captures that truly stood out! This marks the incredible finale of the Chhavi contest! Thank you to all the talented participants who shared their unique perspectives throughout the competition.

The curtains have fallen on another incredible edition of Techniche! The closing pronite was an electrifying experience, featuring the soulful melodies of Amit Mishra and the pulsating beats of DJ Swattrex It was a night of pure joy, music, and unforgettable memories.

A symphony of shadows and light, frozen in time. A moment captured, a tale left unsaid. This video serves as a window into our reality. Each click is like a brushstroke on the imaginary canvas. Enjoy World Photography Day! Join us in celebrating the craft of moment capture.

The 26th edition of Techniche was a resounding success, showcasing the brightest minds and talents from across the nation. From thought-provoking lectures to exhilarating competitions, the event offered a diverse range of experiences for all. Thank you to all the participants, speakers, volunteers, and sponsors who made Techniche 2024 a memorable event. We look forward to seeing you next year!

This week's entries transported us on a captivating journey of architecture. From the soaring heights of modern skyscrapers to the intricate details of ancient monuments, your photos captured the essence of artistic expression living in these structures. Here are the best entries of this week's challenge. A huge shoutout to,,,,,and for their exceptional captures! Get ready for the last theme to be unveiled tomorrow for Week 3 of Chhavi! We can't wait to reveal the next theme and see what stories you capture through your lens.

This week, turn your lens towards the world we've built. Capture the grandeur of a cityscape, the intricate details of a historical landmark, or the unique form of a modern structure. Show us the world through your unique perspective. We can't wait to see your submissions! ✨

Inter-IIT Photostory Submission Part-3/3 We're showcasing our entry for the Photostory competition themed"Silent Bonds" of the Inter-IIT Cultural Meet 6.0. In frame: "The Cursed Connection". In this world full of bonds, not all the ones formed are benevolent. A man picks up a mysterious pendant from the sea, setting in motion a haunting tale of possession and pursuit. A persistent ghost is on a quest to retrieve the pendant, which spans both waking hours and dreams, revealing the unbreakable connection between the pendant and its rightful owner. Once this bond is realized by the man, he immediately gets rid of the pendant, only to be picked up by another unsuspecting passerby. And the haunting continues… #meet6.0

As we close another vibrant chapter of our club’s journey, we want to extend our heartfelt gratitude to the outgoing core team. From the relentless passion of our Secretary and Overall Coordinator to the innovative visions of our Design Head, each moment with you has been nothing short of inspirational. To all our core team members, your dedication and creativity have been the heartbeat of this club. Thank you for your remarkable contributions and dedication. As you hand over the reins to the new team, know that your legacy will continue to inspire and drive us forward. Here’s to all the late nights, early mornings, and perfect shots. Although your tenure is ending, your impact is indelible. A huge thank you for everything, and here’s to new beginnings!

Tasveer presents the much-awaited Photography Exhibition! Immerse yourself in a breathtaking collection of 400+ photographs, spanning across genres like portraits, landscapes, street, wildlife, macro, architecture, nightscapes, and more! This year, we also have a dedicated section showcasing top campus and competition entries. Explore exclusive photobooks from past Tasveer exhibitions, our prestigious FRAMES magazine, and many more exciting displays! Dates: 15th - 16th February
⏰ Time: 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM Venue: New SAC Foyer Don't miss out on this visual extravaganza—see you there! Who knows you might find something familiar.

Are you ready to showcase your photography skills and get featured on our official Montage page? We’re thrilled to launch our Theme-Based Photography Challenge, starting on June 2nd! Each week will feature a unique theme designed to challenge your creativity and capture the beauty of the world around us, all through the lens of your phone camera. ✨ Register using the link in the bio. Themes:
- New themes will be announced every Sunday on our Instagram account. How to Participate:
1. Follow our Instagram account.
2. Check our Sunday post for the weekly theme.
3. Submit your photos through the provided form. The best photos each week will be featured on our official Montage page! ✨ Stay tuned for more details. Happy snapping!
